header.title: Explore the Nature of Mogi
header.subtitle: Discover the natural treasures our region has to offer

park1.title: Parque das Neblinas
park1.description: An Atlantic Forest reserve managed by the Instituto Ecofuturo, located in the Serra do Mar. The park promotes conservation, research, and environmental education.

highlights.item1: Ecological trails (with or without a guide)

experience.label: Experience:
experience.text: Ideal for those seeking a deep connection with nature and environmental learning.

highlights.item1: Lakes with koi and Japanese bridges

experience.label: Experience:
experience.text: Perfect for family strolls and relaxing outdoors.

park3.title: Pico do Urubu
park3.description: One of the highest viewpoints in Mogi, with stunning panoramic views of the region. It's highly visited by adventure lovers.

highlights.item1: Short trail accessible by foot or vehicle

experience.label: Experience:
experience.text: Recommended for those who enjoy natural views and extreme sports.
